columns.District_ID: The unique identifier for each district.
columns.Name: The name of the district.
columns.Area_km: The total area of the district in square kilometers.
columns.Population: The total population residing in the district.
columns.Density_km: The population density calculated per square kilometer.
columns.Government_website: The official government website for the district.

district.table_description: The table provides demographic and geographic information about districts.

columns.Spokesman_ID: The unique identifier for each spokesman.
columns.Name: The full name of the spokesman.
columns.Age: The age of the spokesman in years.
columns.Speach_title: The title of the speech given by the spokesman.
columns.Rank_position: The ranking position of the spokesman based on performance.
columns.Points: The total points accumulated by the spokesman.

spokesman.table_description: The table provides information about various spokesmen and their attributes.

columns.Spokesman_ID: The unique identifier for each spokesman in the district.
columns.District_ID: The unique identifier for the associated district.
columns.Start_year: The year the spokesman began representing the district.

spokesman_district.table_description: The table links spokesmen to their respective districts and start years.
